column2: so was the food at Smoque worth the 45 minute wait?  ...Kinda?  I guess?  I mean
column3: don't get me wrong.  The St. Louis style ribs were perfectly done--meaty
column5: and not swimming in fat.  The chopped brisket (yes
column6: I got ribs with a side of brisket--you wanna make something of it?) was moist and full of flavor.  But 45 minutes in line?  Really?  When there are so many other great rib joints
column7: even on the northwest side?  Next time
column8: I'm definitely calling ahead.  Some things are worth the wait
column9: but some things just require better planning.
